name: Echoes (itch) (FeuilleMorte Entertainment)
description:
A short cyberpunk action stealth game about working with your past selves to pull off an impossible heist !

The game is playable in browser but we highly recommend to download it for a better quality.

CONTROLS :
WASD/arrow keys : move
Left click/Space : Interact
Right click : shoot (only 2 bullets per life)
escape : pause game You're the most reknown thief in this city. Each time you're reported dead, and yet you always seem to come back. This time it's a big score. Break in, bypass security and get the supercomputer data . Good Luck
Credits :

Made in 72 hours for the Wowie Game Jam 2021 by Raphael Blanchard and Maxence Maire.
A game by FeuilleMorte Entertainment.
